text:
@BBCWorld MAGA MAGA
Make America a Graveyard Again
3000 Americans died on 9/11 = Bush attacked Iraq.
1000 Americans die each day from COVID-19 so Trump attacks:
The Media?
China?
Science?
Obama?
All of the Above.
Bacon is better than Trump.
Bacon never lies.
